attributes.action: Review and increase the monetary requirements for Free School Meals
attributes.additional_details:
For many of us the recent cost of living increases mean we are choosing to either eat hot meals or heat our homes. 

If these figures/requirements are increased thousands more children will be entitled to hot school dinners and discounted travel to and from school.

There are some families on universal credit who have been forced to work more hours or be sanctioned when their youngest child reaches 5. They then no longer qualify for free school meals when their required to apply again.
attributes.background:
I would like you to review the current requirements to claim free school meals 

The cost of living has increased over the years and more so this year. I believe the earning figures to be eligible should be increased to help bring hundreds of thousands of families above the poverty line
